title: Transmission lags behind renewable energy power curtailment: MNRE Secretary Santosh Kumar Sarangi
full_text: Transmission lags behind renewable energy power curtailment: MNRE Secretary Santosh Kumar Sarangi. Renewable energy curtailment in Rajasthan is expected to reduce sharply once the Fatehgarh transmission line becomes operational, as evacuation constraints caused by delayed transmission infrastructure begin to ease, the MNRE has said.. The curtailment of renewable energy (RE) power in Rajasthan is expected to ease significantly with the commissioning of the transmission line in Fatehgarh, Santosh Kumar Sarangi, Secretary at the Min… [+4138 chars]
